did.abstract: Constance Reid (1918-2010) was a writer who specialized in biographies of mathematicians. The Constance Reid Collection of Richard Courant Oral History Interviews consists of oral history transcripts and some additional ephemera donated by Constance Reid to the Courant Institute Library.
did.physloc: Materials are stored offsite and advance notice is required for use. Please request materials at least two business days prior to your research visit to coordinate access.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Constance Reid Collection of Richard Courant Oral History Interviews consists of oral history transcripts and some additional ephemera donated by Constance Reid to the Courant Institute Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection has not been arranged by an archivist. The materials are arranged in the order in which they were received from the donor.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection is protected by copyright and/or related rights. Duplication and photography of materials are prohibited. For other uses you need to obtain permission from the rights-holder(s).

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: This collection was treated as an administrative transfer to the New York University Archives from the Courant Institute in the summer of 2023 when the Courant Institute Library closed. The accession number associated with this transfer is 2024.001.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date; Constance Reid Collection of Richard Courant Oral History Interviews; MC 383; box number; folder number or item identifier; New York University Archives, New York University.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: At the time of accessioning materials were rehoused in archival boxes and described on the collection-level, with more granular rehousing, description, and an inventory deferred due to uncertainty regarding the materials' intellectual property status.
Some interview subjects express concerns about their statements being recorded.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Constance Reid (1918-2010) was a writer who specialized in biographies of mathematicians.

custodhist.head: Custodial History
custodhist.p: Constane Reid donated this collection to the Courant Institute of Mathematical Sciences Library in December 2004.
